# Zensical Migration Escalation Playbook Template

Use this playbook to escalate migration incidents quickly and consistently.

## Incident metadata

- Date/time detected:
- Incident owner:
- Severity (P0/P1/P2/P3):
- Affected scope:
- Current status:

## Escalation triggers

- [ ] Critical user-facing outage
- [ ] Repeated deployment failures
- [ ] Broken core navigation or content routes
- [ ] Rollback decision required

## Escalation path

1. Notify incident channel with impact summary.
2. Assign incident owner and technical lead.
3. Capture triage details in issue template.
4. Decide mitigation path: hotfix/rollback/hold.
5. Post checkpoint updates every agreed interval.

## Communication checkpoints

- Initial alert sent:
- First status update sent:
- Decision update sent:
- Closure update sent:

## Resolution and follow-up

- Resolution action:
- Verification status:
- Postmortem required: yes/no
- Follow-up tasks created:
